name: INAddTasksIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface for adding tasks to a task list.

items.name: func resolveTargetTaskList(for: INAddTasksIntent, with: (INAddTasksTargetTaskListResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the task list to receive the new tasks.

items.name: func resolveTaskTitles(for: INAddTasksIntent, with: ([INSpeakableStringResolutionResult]) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the titles for the tasks.

items.name: func resolveSpatialEventTrigger(for: INAddTasksIntent, with: (INSpatialEventTriggerResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the location-based trigger associated with the new tasks.

items.name: func resolveTemporalEventTrigger(for: INAddTasksIntent, with: (INAddTasksTemporalEventTriggerResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the time-based trigger associated with the new tasks.

items.name: func resolvePriority(for: INAddTasksIntent, with: (INTaskPriorityResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the priority associated with the new tasks.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INAddTasksIntent, completion: (INAddTasksIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms whether you can add the tasks to the task list.

items.name: func handle(intent: INAddTasksIntent, completion: (INAddTasksIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Handles the creation of a task list.
